full_text:
Part III - Investigation
22. Date And Time Investigation Began
7/30/2019 12:40PM
23. Inmate Advised Of Right To Remain Silent: You Are Advised Of Your Right To Remain Silent At All Stages Of The Disciplinary Process But Are Informed That Your Silence May Be Used To Draw An Adverse Inference Against You At Any Stage Of The Institutional Disciplinary Process. You Are Also Informed That Your Silence Alone May Not Be Used To Support A Finding That You Have Committed A Prohibited Act.
The Inmate Was Advised Of The Above Right By (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) enant (Date/time) 7/30/2019 12:40PM
24. Inmate Statement And Attitude: Inmate Epstein, Jeffery #76318-054 was advised of his rights and understood his rights as read. Inmate Epstein stated "I no comment at this time". Inmate Epstein had a poor attitude. Inmate Epstein was furnished a copy of this report.
25. Other Facts About The Incident, Statements Of Those Persons Present At Scene, Disposition Of Evidence, Etc. No witnesses requested. Please see attached staff memorandum, photograph and medical assessment. This incident report was served late due to inmate on suicide watch.
26. Investigator's Comments And Conclusions: Based on the writer's description of the incident in block #11, of the incident report, This investigator concludes the report to be accurate as written and the charge warranted.
27. Action Taken: Inmate Epstein is in his special housing unit status, this report referred to UDC for further disposition.
Date and Time Investigation Completed 7/30/2019 12:45PM
Printed Name/signature Of Investigator (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Signature
Title Lieutenant

You Are Also Informed That Your Silence Alone May Not Be Used To Support A Finding That You Have Committed A Prohibited Act.

24. Inmate Statement And Attitude: Inmate Epstein, Jeffery #76318-054 was advised of his rights and understood his rights as read. Inmate Epstein stated "I no comment at this time". Inmate Epstein had a poor attitude. Inmate Epstein was furnished a copy of this report.

25. Other Facts About The Incident, Statements Of Those Persons Present At Scene, Disposition Of Evidence, Etc. No witnesses requested. Please see attached staff memorandum, photograph and medical assessment. This incident report was served late due to inmate on suicide watch.

26. Investigator's Comments And Conclusions: Based on the writer's description of the incident in block #11, of the incident report, This investigator concludes the report to be accurate as written and the charge warranted.
27. Action Taken: Inmate Epstein is in his special housing unit status, this report referred to UDC for further disposition.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned investigation report related to Jeffery Epstein. There are redactions in the form of (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) indicating sensitive information has been withheld.
